item.title: :smiley: Our paper named <font color=#FF0000 >**WebInf: Accelerating WebGPU-based In-browser DNN Inference via Adaptive Model Partitioning**</font> is accepted to **IEEE ICPADS 2023**! Congrats to Dong Bing!
:four_leaf_clover: Honored to be awarded for **Outstanding Ph.D. Dissertation of ACM China (Hangzhou Chapter)** !
:smiley: Our paper named <font color=#FF0000 >**The First Measurement Study of Target Wake Time Mechanism in 802.11ax on COTS Devices**</font> is accepted to **IEEE ICC 2023**! Congrats to Chengqing!

:smiley: Our paper named <font color=#FF0000 >**BLEdge: Edge-centric programming for BLE applications with multi-connection optimization**</font> is accepted to **IEEE INFOCOM 2023**! Congrats to Yeming!
:teacher: I am now an Assistant Professor of **School of Computer Science and Engineering, Southeast University**.
:mortar_board: I pass my PhD defense! The title of my PhD thesis is <font color=#FF0000 >**Research on Holistic Development of Internet of Things Applications with Cloud-Edge Integration**</font>.

:smiley: Our paper named <font color=#FF0000 >**LinkLab 2.0: A multi-tenant programmable IoT testbed for experimentation with edge-cloud integration**</font> is accepted to [**USENIX NSDI 2023**](https://www.usenix.org/conference/nsdi23) !

:smiley: Our paper named <font color=#FF0000 >**Bringing WebAssembly to Resource-constrained IoT Devices for Seamless Device-Cloud Integration**</font> is accepted to [**ACM MobiSys 2022**](https://www.sigmobile.org/mobisys/2022/) ! Many thanks to our shepherd, Jeremy Andrus, for helping us improve this paper.
:four_leaf_clover: Honored to be awarded for *National Scholarship of China* !

:smiley: Our paper named <font color=#FF0000 >**Edge-centric Programming for IoT Applications with Automatic Code Partitioning**</font> is accepted to [**IEEE Trans. on Computers**](https://www.computer.org/csdl/journal/tc) !
:handshake: Presenting our <font color=#FF0000 >**LinkLab**</font> project at *56th Higher Education EXPO China* ! Check it out [here](http://www.heexpochina.com/) and see you in Tsingtao!
:smiley: Our paper named **ThingSpire OS: a WebAssembly-based IoT Operating System for Cloud-Edge Integration** is accepted as a poster of **ACM MobiSys 2021** !
:handshake: Presenting **WiProg** and **S2** at *IEEE INFOCOM 2021* ! Check it out [here](https://infocom.info/)!
item.description: 🤝 Presenting WiProg and S2 at IEEE INFOCOM 2021 ! Check it out here!

item.title: :four_leaf_clover: Honored to be awarded for INFOCOM 2021 Student Conference Grant! See you soon (online)!

:smiley: Our paper named **S2: a Small Delta and Small Memory Differencing Algorithm for Reprogramming Resource-constrained IoT Devices** is accepted as a poster of [**IEEE INFOCOM 2021**](https://infocom2021.ieee-infocom.org/) !
item.description: 😃 Our paper named S2: a Small Delta and Small Memory Differencing Algorithm for Reprogramming Resource-constrained IoT Devices is accepted as a poster of IEEE INFOCOM 2021 !

item.description: See here or via the top of this page. Stars and pull requests are also welcome!

item.description: 😃 Our paper named Queec: QoE-aware Edge Computing for IoT Devices under Dynamic Workloads is accepted to ACM Trans. on Sensor Networks !

item.description: 😃 Our paper named WiProg: A WebAssembly-based Approach to Integrated IoT Programming is accepted to IEEE INFOCOM 2021 !

item.title: :handshake: Presenting EdgeProg at *IEEE ICDCS 2020* ! Check it out [here](https://youtu.be/9GvDJULGD14)! This year is the 40th anniversary of ICDCS, see more at [Conf. Program](https://icdcs2020.sg/prerecordedvideos.html).
item.description: 🤝 Presenting EdgeProg at IEEE ICDCS 2020 ! Check it out here! This year is the 40th anniversary of ICDCS, see more at Conf. Program.
